title: Threadless
content:
What typeface does threadless ( [http://www.threadless.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130618031626/http:/www.threadless.com/ "http://www.threadless.com") ) use for their site? Not the logo, just the rest of the headers and such.

Thank you.
author: Guerella

comments.content: PS; George is a human font-identifying machine!
chester: I just had to say it, Apex and Infinity are sooooo nice. Maybe I'll get to know you in person one day

Thank you.

I agree Apex is a beautiful typeface.
